beforeHooks.title: "before all" hook

tests.title: should return UIController
tests.fullTitle: UIController tests UIController class tests should return UIController
tests.code:
const unorderedListFactory = new UnorderedListFactory(), controller = new UIController('#myList', 'unordered-list', unorderedListFactory) expect(controller).to.be.instanceOf(UIController) expect(document.getElementById('myList').innerHTML).equal('
  • 1
  • 2
  • 3
')

tests.title: should change the vm
tests.fullTitle: UIController tests UIController class tests should change the vm
tests.code:
const
unorderedListFactory = new UnorderedListFactory(),
controller = new UIController('#myList', 'unordered-list', unorderedListFactory)
controller.setViewModel([3, 4, 5])
expect(controller.vm).to.deep.equal({ 'items': [3, 4, 5] })

tests.title: should render the template
tests.fullTitle: UIController tests UIController class tests should render the template
tests.code:
const unorderedListFactory = new UnorderedListFactory(), controller = new UIController('#myList', 'unordered-list', unorderedListFactory) controller.setViewModel([3, 4, 5]) controller.render() const view = document.getElementById('myList').innerHTML expect(view).equal('
  • 3
  • 4
  • 5
')

tests.title: should get the ul node
tests.fullTitle: UIController tests UIController class tests should get the ul node
tests.code:
const
unorderedListFactory = new UnorderedListFactory(),
controller = new UIController('#myList', 'unordered-list', unorderedListFactory),
ulNode     = controller.getComponentNode('ul')
expect(ulNode.nodeName).equal('UL')

tests.title: should get the li nodes
tests.fullTitle: UIController tests UIController class tests should get the li nodes
tests.code:
const
unorderedListFactory = new UnorderedListFactory(),
controller = new UIController('#myList', 'unordered-list', unorderedListFactory)
controller.setViewModel([3, 4, 5])
controller.render()
const liNodes = controller.getComponentNodes('li')
expect(liNodes.length).equal(3)

tests.title: should return UIControllerInjector
tests.fullTitle: UIController tests UIController injector tests should return UIControllerInjector
tests.code:
const
controllersFactory   = new ControllersFactory(),
injector = new UIControllerInjector(controllersFactory)
expect(injector).to.be.instanceOf(UIControllerInjector)

tests.title: should inject UnorderedListController
tests.fullTitle: UIController tests UIController injector tests should inject UnorderedListController
tests.code:
const
controllersFactory  = new ControllersFactory(),
injector            = new UIControllerInjector(controllersFactory)
injector.inject()
expect(window.controllers['myList']).to.be.instanceOf(UIController)

tests.title: should throw CONTROLLER_FUNCTION_NOT_EXIST error
tests.fullTitle: UIController tests UIController injector tests should throw CONTROLLER_FUNCTION_NOT_EXIST error
tests.code:
const
controllersFactory  = new ControllersFactory(),
injector            = new UIControllerInjector(controllersFactory),
div                 = document.createElement('div')
// We add a component div with id that has no controller function
div.id = 'inject-error'
div.classList.add('component-wrapper')
div.setAttribute('data-component', 'component-inexistent')
document.body.append(div)
expect(() =>
{
  injector.inject()
}).to.throw(/Controller 'component-inexistent' does not have a function/)

tests.title: should return a string with the given JSON object
tests.fullTitle: Handlebars JSON stringify helper tests should return a string with the given JSON object
tests.code:
const
handlebarsJSONhelper = require('.'),
str                  = handlebarsJSONhelper({ hello: 'world' })
assert(
  typeof str === 'string' &&
  str === '{"hello":"world"}'
)
